pr_title: Setting up a CI pipeline based on GitHub Actions

timeline.message: Setting up a CI pipeline based on GitHub Actions

timeline.bodyText: Just curious, what is the reason to use checkout@v1 instead of v2?
timeline.author: lahirumaramba
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,17 @@
+name: Java Continuous Integration
+
+on: [push, pull_request]
+
+jobs:
+  build:
+
+    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
+
+    steps:
+    - uses: actions/checkout@v1
